RT @SenBooker .@SenatorTimScott & I introduced bipartisan legislation to encourage capital investments in low-income or distressed communities called Opportunity Zones. Excited to see tremendous progress being made in setting up these zones throughout NJ. http://www.roi-nj.com/2018/06/06/finance/experts-opportunity-zones-are-designed-to-address-economic-inequality-within-a-community/

We need more women like her in Congress, not less. #Pride http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DfQz5SMW4AA24Yj.jpg

To the graduates of the Class of 2018: 

You are your ancestors' wildest dreams. And as you each strive to make that dream ever more real, my hope is you never forget the breathtaking power of love. 

Listen to my full speech to @Princeton: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/lift-every-voice/id1334991206?mt=2&i=1000413295999 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1005467254287491073/pu/img/-eDKHJa3T35hOB7K.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1005467254287491073/pu/vid/240x240/IrHg1QZkt9iDh0go.mp4?tag=3

"Don't forget the title does not make the man, the man or woman must make the title" – @CoryBooker, graduation speech to @Princeton's Great Class of 2018.

Full speech available on #LiftEveryVoice podcast. Legalizing marijuana at the federal level is about stopping our country from repeating the same mistakes of the past. Most Americans already know that too many lives have been needlessly ruined because of the War on Drugs. We need to get this done. https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/wonk/wp/2018/06/04/65-percent-of-americans-now-say-its-morally-acceptable-to-smoke-weed/

RT @SenBooker Today, on #WorldOceansDay, I introduced the SAVE Right Whales Act to help reduce the impacts of human activities on North Atlantic right whales.
 
There are only 450 of these whales remaining in the world—if we don’t take immediate action they could go extinct in our lifetimes.

I am so inspired by the hundreds of women of color leading our party in the 2018 elections. Their leadership will pave the way for the next generation. As my mother said, “you may be the first to do many things, but make sure you are not the last.” https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/native-american-woman-congress_us_5b16ffbfe4b0599bc6ddfa24

I’ve already contacted Ben Carson to demand a justification for his proposal to raise rent on low-income households.
